name: Havas People
description: The worlds of work and study are changing fast, and we help brands, businesses and people change with them. Through our work we change how our clients attract, talk and interact with their audiences. And we change people’s perceptions, behaviours and ambitions. What’s more, we do this right across the candidate, employee and student lifecycles. Influencing choices at every touchpoint, whether it’s helping talent make the right career move or students find the perfect university.
business_objectives: Reduce the Cost of Hiring Qualified Employees
Headline: A talent communications agency that keeps brands and businesses meaningful in the ever-changing worlds of work and study.
ShortDescription: Havas People are specialists in building connections between brands and talent.
enhanced_description: Havas People is a talent communications agency that helps brands, businesses, and educational institutions adapt to the evolving worlds of work and study. Specializing in building strong connections between brands and talent, they influence choices across the entire candidate, employee, and student lifecycles. Their core offerings include comprehensive recruitment marketing, education marketing, and strategic solutions for learning, development, and employee motivation. Through these services, Havas People aims to help clients attract and engage their target audiences effectively, ultimately working to reduce the cost of hiring qualified employees and improve overall talent outcomes.
key_use_cases: Attracting qualified talent through recruitment marketing
Developing and motivating employees through L&D initiatives
Influencing student choices and perceptions in education
Building and managing employer brand reputation
competitive_advantages: Broad lifecycle coverage: Addresses candidate, employee, and student audiences.
Dual focus on work and study: Combines recruitment marketing with education marketing expertise.
Specialized talent communications agency: Deep expertise in connecting brands and talent.
Long-standing history and experience: Established in 1835, implying extensive market knowledge.
Holistic approach: Covers attraction, interaction, perceptions, behaviors, and ambitions.
hr_functions_supported: Workforce Planning (indirectly, by addressing talent needs)
roi_benefits: Reduced cost of hiring qualified employees
Improved quality and volume of talent attraction
Enhanced brand perception among candidates, employees, and students
Increased employee motivation and development outcomes
